author: cmlenz
msg: Some changes to accomodate checkstyle HEAD.
Most importantly, the various *LeftCurly checkers seem to have been merged
into a single configurable LeftCurly checker.

author: cmlenz
msg: - Change ServletURL.getPort() to return the default port of
the protocol in case the server name has been specified
but does not include the port.
- Javadoc improvements for getHost() and getPort()

author: cmlenz
msg: Follow the DTD changes; this is starting to be fun ;-)

author: vmassol
msg: Added Jenerator in the resource section

author: vmassol
msg: Added link to the Cactus maven plugin
